attributes.action: Call for a new general election
attributes.additional_details: Labour would rather give billions to the vulnerable in Ukraine, rather then helping the vulnerable in this country. They are attacking the disabled people who are on pip, leaving uncertainty about their award in the future, and forcing people into poverty cause of their actions, President Trump is giving back to the American people, whilst our government is taking from it's people.
attributes.background: Call for a new general election, labour is destroying the lives of its people

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call a General Election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
